channel.title: Scraping on BlitzLiving
channel.description: Recent content in Scraping on BlitzLiving

item.title: Designing a scalabale content crawler with a dashboard
item.description: Goals: To create a comprehensive repository of blogposts from multiple sources. Shorten time required to find relevant items to post read and search. To provide our users a steady stream of content relevant to the Interests & Topics selected by them.
